entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brier Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:43 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brier Island 7:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 5.1°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
